ygData.subject: Re: Alliance VS Maximals
ygData.msgSnippet: I ll let it pass, Hot Rod and Prowler, but you guys traveled over 1000 miles in one post. Next time, I ll call it and make you start back at base or something.

I'll let it pass, Hot Rod and Prowler, but you guys traveled over 1000 miles 
in one post. Next time, I'll call it and make you start back at base or 
something.

::The Oblitercons/Firearm/Proto::

Firearm nods. "That's them," he says as he speeds up, the battle in sight.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Dark One spins around as he hears a voice behind him, raising his hands 
instinctively to protect his face as an explosion sends him flipping 
backwards, nearly falling into the canopy. A chain barely misses him as his 
jetpack stops him from crashing through the trees..

He growls, looking at where the missile came from, his eyes widening as he 
sees a few shots coming at him, ducking in time to avoid them.

Firearm and Proto fly into view, opening fire on Dark One and Hiss, the two 
flying Oblitertrons.

Dark One activates his comm-link. "Alliance base," he says into it, the 
transmission heading off toward the Alliance base, "I might need 
reinforcements here."

He looks back at the Maximals, ducking under a few more shots. He opens fire 
with his rifle, shots heading toward Firearm.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Scavanger runs out into the clearing with Dinobot, Tavatron, and another bot, 
traforming into altillery cannon mode, opening fire on the three bots.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Riding in tank mode through the forest, Pyro picks up Koj on his scanners, 
his cannon swirling around to fire several shots at the Maximal.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Breakdown transforms into robot mode, running into a clearing and firing up 
at the Maximal flyers.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Seeing a missile come out of nowhere and hit his leader, Hiss aims himself 
(he's in gun mode), at the place where the missile came out of, firing 
several shots in their direction.
